text: dimensions 2 through 6. The consciousness within the Sphere of Amenti would leave the morphogenetic field and express into manifestation as Root Races within each of those dimensional bands, building up into the DNA pattern strands 2 through 6. Through this pattern of building DNA through time, incarnates within each time period/dimensional band would be able to pull together the frequencies of their dimensional strand (through a series of 24 incarnations/two 12-cycles), link with the morphogenetic field of their Cloistered Race, pick up strands 7-12 from the Cloister, pass through the other Cloisters and pick up the 11
